remarks: Rule used to change first two bound variables in an operation abstraction, using implicit substitution.  (Contributed by NM, 21-Feb-2004.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 22-Oct-2011.)
statement:
cbvoprab12.1 $e |- F/ w ph $.
cbvoprab12.2 $e |- F/ v ph $.
cbvoprab12.3 $e |- F/ x ps $.
cbvoprab12.4 $e |- F/ y ps $.
cbvoprab12.5 $e |- ( ( x = w /\ y = v ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
cbvoprab12 $p |- { <. <. x , y >. , z >. | ph } = { <. <. w , v >. , z >. | ps } $.
$d v w x y z $.
